description: Lilith is the last remaining fairy in the Pentagona world. Daba finds Lilith in the possession of a man in the city of Prearmo on Koam and purchases her from him. Lilith`s short stature prevents her from piloting a Heavy Metal but she frequently accompanies Daba when he is piloting and helps with chores such as cooking. Later in the series she helps prevent a nuclear explosion at the asteroid base Palarta Star during which she is seriously injured for several episodes.
name: Lilith Fau
